TopicTitle: How many saves do you guys have?

Articles.Content:
On my PC, i have like 10 different saves, all with interesting missions going on, but because i use lots of mods and keep installing new ones, meaning new saves. Although I'm now trying to standardize my mods, when i read a lot of posts on here people talk about their one save.

It made me think, how many people have more than one save? And if you have more than 1, what is the reason behind it?
Just 2 for me. One for testing, and the other for my actual gameplay.

I have 2 saves. 1 for sandbox and 1 for career. They both get deleted and restarted after every update though, so really I've had like a thousand saves ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Yeah me too, 1 normally one save for sandbox and one for career. Since the last update though, I've only been playing sandbox, only have the one save going. Waiting for 1.0 to start a new career.
